title: Testimonials
heading1: What My Professors, Employers And Colleagues Say About Me
heading2: Most common methods for designing websites that work well on desktop is responsive and adaptive design

testimonials.name: Twaha Ahmed Minai
testimonials.details: Aaqib had been among my exceptional students at DSU. He has a natural capacity to analyze processes logically and to see a big picture always. I feel that he can do wonders during his professional and academic endeavors. Wish him success, happiness and prosperity always.

testimonials.name: Ben Seidl
testimonials.profession: Founder of Neyborly - Advisor at Remotebase - Investor Feld Ventures
testimonials.details: Aaqib was a crucial part of our team as we launched some of the company's most important software. He was diligent, productive, and was able to create innovative solutions for our backend.

testimonials.name: Muhammad Abdullah
testimonials.profession: Software Engineer at Fireflies.ai | MERN Stack Developer | Team lead at Remotebase
testimonials.details: Aaqib is a great team player and very easy to work with. He understands quickly and very good at researching. Would definitely want to work with him again

testimonials.name: Muhammad Azmi Umer
testimonials.profession: Senior Lecturer at DHA Suffa University
testimonials.details: Aaqib is an intelligent student and an honest person. Overall, I have found him as a good human being.

testimonials.name: M.Zain Rafique
testimonials.profession: Principal Software Engineer and Technical Team Lead(Ruby on Rails, Angular, Aws)
testimonials.details: I was particularly impressed by Aaqib's ability to handle even the toughest situationâ€”effortlessly. He writes good quality code. He is a good developer and a good friend.

testimonials.name: Shiraz Malkani
testimonials.details: Aaqib is very hard working, honest with work, and intelligent. He is fast learner, and always eager to learn new technologies. Beside being hard worker and always looking for performing 110%, he is also a good socializer. Must to have on one's tech team.

testimonials.name: Farhaj Ahmed
testimonials.profession: Software Engineer - iOS @ MMC Global | MBA - IBA '21 | Digital Creator
testimonials.details: I have observed Aaqib as a great problem solver. He is a quick learner who can unlearn, relearn and adapt to the latest tech-related practices. You will find him as a great team player. When it comes to writing clean code, he is the perfect fit for any company.

testimonials.name: Muhammad Daniyal Atif
testimonials.profession: Technical QA Engineer at The Talent Games | Test Automation Engineer
testimonials.details: Great problem solving skills. Keep up!

testimonials.name: Fawad Afzal
testimonials.details: A very efficient, professional and a hardworking person
